bibl.title: Re-centering Epic Nostos: Gender and Genre in Sappho's Brothers Poem.
bibl.note: P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Nestor's Nostos: putting Lesbos on the map. - Gendering nostos. - Locating Lesbos in performance. - Larichos and the syntax of salvation. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Melissa Mueller, Re-centering Epic Nostos: Gender and Genre in Sappho's Brothers Poem.

P. Coll. privées [P. Sapph. Obbink] (= M.-P.3 1445.02; LDAB 341738). - Nestor's Nostos: putting Lesbos on the map. - Gendering nostos. - Locating Lesbos in performance. - Larichos and the syntax of salvation. - Conclusion.
